es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification.Notification

    Package Description
    es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification  

    • Uses of Notification in es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification

      Subclasses of Notification in es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InteractionNotification
      A InteractionNotification store information of Events, cause in SHANKS all interactions between two elements are defined by them.
      class  ValueNotification
      ValueNotifactions are user-made notifications that trace the value of certain field, variable or whatever it wants to save for consult later.
      Methods in es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification that return Notification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Notification NotificationManager.getByID(String id)
      Search for a notification with the given id.
      Methods in es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification that return types with arguments of type Notification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Notification> NotificationManager.getByInteraction(String interaction)
      Search for notifications of interaction type that match the given class name.
      List<Notification> NotificationManager.getBySource(Object source)
      Search for notifications originated from the given source object.
      List<Notification> NotificationManager.getByStep(int step)
      Search for notifications saved on the given step.
      List<Notification> NotificationManager.getByTarget(Object target)
      Search for notifications of interaction type that match the given target object .
      ArrayList<Notification> NotificationManager.getByType(Class<?> type)
      Search for notifications that match the corresponding notifications realization.
      Methods in es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.notification with parameters of type Notification
